entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
